entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow or ice pellets with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind northeast 30 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
